Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody understands another's sorrow, and nobody another's joy

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Every night when I go to bed, I hope that I may never wake again, and every morning renews my grief

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: A man endures misfortune without complaint

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to decorate my imagination as much as I can

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Easy mind, light heart. A mind that is too easy hides a heart that is too heavy

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The manager is to be blamed who distributes parts to his players which they are unable to act

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The world resembles a stage on which every man is playing a part

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The moment is supreme

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Approval or blame will follow in the world to come

Quote.Author: Franz Schubert
Quote.QuoteValue: I am composing like a god, as if it simply had to be done as it has been done

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: The first thing that strikes a visitor to Paris is a taxi

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I play a musical instrument a little, but only for my own amazement

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could get my membership fee back, I'd resign from the human race

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: An income tax form is like a laundry list - either way you lose your shirt

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: The advertising world had space men in it before spacemen existed

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Hanging is too good for a man who makes puns; he should be drawn and quoted

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Television is a medium because anything well done is rare

Quote.Author: Fred Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: California is a fine place to live - if you happen to be an orange

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: There are so many ingredients that are approved for use. You can't be an expert on all of them

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: It's tough for people to get into business, especially a small business

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: Profit or perish... There are only two ways to make money: increase sales and decrease costs

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: I made the first sandwich before entering college

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: The payroll tax is affecting sales. It's causing sales declines

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: Subway is a real point of pride. We have influenced the way people eat

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have much of a bucket list. I don't have a lot of needs and desires

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: We have always had many more franchisee candidates than available locations

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: In the U.S. and Canada, we have one store for every 12,000 people

Quote.Author: Fred DeLuca
Quote.QuoteValue: To a large extent, we're working hard to fulfill the consumer demand for Subway sandwiches

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: My life. The life I'm living that's where all my inspiration comes from. Real life experiences

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: Prague is a dark place

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm OCD beyond comparison

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't support Limp Bizkit being on some snuff backyard brawling, fighting contest

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: I love finding EPs for bands that you just discover

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: I love electronic music, and I love drum and bass

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: I love jazz music and sad music. I'm a sentimental guy. I'm a romantic guy

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sentimental guy

Quote.Author: Fred Durst
Quote.QuoteValue: When I look back on my knee-jerk reactions now, I realize I should have just taken a breath

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to, as I say, build bridges where you can - but draw lines where you must

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot more to competence than a law degree and a modicum of courtroom skill

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: We're hoping for the best, but we need to prepare for the worst

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem is that agencies sometimes lose sight of common sense as they create regulations

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: But if the Chinese mainland, the PRC, attacked Taiwan, we'd be obligated to come to their aid

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Clearly, the Chinese know that we want a good relationship with them

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Hopefully, we can build bridges, but we also have to draw lines

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody wants to open a business near a Superfund site and risk being sued

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Superfund was passed with the good intention of cleaning up America's toxic waste sites

Quote.Author: Fred Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: We also have to ask if we focusing on the most important priorities

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe Android will be stronger in the developing world than it is in the developed world

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: To see things differently requires you to be wired a little differently

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a free speech bigot. I don't like censorship; I just don't think it's a good thing

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think 'crazy' is a compliment. I think you make money with people who are crazy

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Facebook is not an unstoppable juggernaut. There are a lot of other things people can do on the web

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When my dad was in Vietnam, we lost a parent for a year. Thank God we didn't lose a parent for good

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Marketing is for companies who have sucky products

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Equity capital is expensive. Every time you do a raise, you dilute

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's upsetting to me that you have to be a millionaire to invest in your friend's start-up

Quote.Author: Fred Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Start-ups should be hunch-driven early on and data-driven as they scale

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, feeling good is line drives to left field

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing I can really do but keep going out there and swinging

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy and have fun when you're a kid, because you are a kid

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Just have fun, and just play hard, and just practice a lot

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think this world needs a little more hugging in their lives

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Coming in here and having fun with the guys, loving everyone, playing this game - it's a lot of fun

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I love coming home

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: You're going to be friends with people longer than you're going to be teammates in this game

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Thrilling, thrilling to see yourself on a baseball card for the first time

Quote.Author: Freddie Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: When you come back on top after you've fallen, it's a better story

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't be a rock star. I will be a legend

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: When the whole point of Queen was to be original

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a musical prostitute, my dear

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: A concert is not a live rendition of our album. It's a theatrica! event

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: What will I be doing in twenty years' time? I'll be dead, darling! Are you crazy?

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: Money may not buy happiness, but it can damn well give it!

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason we're successful, darling? My overall charisma, of course

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very emotional; I think I may go mad in several years' time

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: I dress to kill, but tastefully

Quote.Author: Freddie Mercury
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew I was a star And now, the rest of the world seems to agree with me

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've heard, 'May the Force be with you' about as many times as, 'Hey, how you doing?'

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if acting is genetic. Maybe it's environmental

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I think success shows a person's true colors

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never seen 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer.'

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't like hurting people; I like making people feel good

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up all over the place, but the majority of my years were spent in Albuquerque, New Mexico

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Speaking Spanish isn't a benefit in Hollywood

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I would have loved to have played Spider-Man

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really read magazines that much. I read comic books

Quote.Author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: High school's like another planet

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Straight-up digital delivery will be the way the future works

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: The moment you've brought a toothbrush to work, then you're getting into crunch time

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Drift racing is expensive

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Defying genre conventions is instantly a risky move

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not even very good at most video games

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Non-studio entities can experiment with storytelling that might be too niche... for a studio

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Online is another way for all of us to reach people

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: One of our goals is to figure out ways of diversifying where we are

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Venture capitalists don't pay attention to you unless you have an app or a widget

Quote.Author: Freddie Wong
Quote.QuoteValue: Content financing is a difficult beast no matter what era of Hollywood we're talking about

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: A crown is merely a hat that lets the rain in

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: If my soldiers were to begin to think, not one of them would remain in the army

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I begin by taking. I shall find scholars later to demonstrate my perfect right

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion is the idol of the mob; it adores everything it does not understand

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: He who defends everything defends nothing

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: What is the good of experience if you do not reflect?

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't forget your great guns, which are the most respectable arguments of the rights of kings

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Rogues, would you live forever?

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: An educated people can be easily governed

Quote.Author: Frederick the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man has a wild beast within him

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of thinking about the future is not to predict it but to raise people's hopes

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to get mugged than to live a life of fear

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Aviation is the branch of engineering that is least forgiving of mistakes

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The technologies which have had the most profound effects on human life are usually simple

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a great satisfaction in building good tools for other people to use

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The pain of childbirth is not remembered. It's the child that's remembered

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately the global warming hysteria, as I see it, is driven by politics more than by science

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Younger people have so many opportunities. I don't see any pessimism among them

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the freedom to do what I want... bright people to talk to every day

Quote.Author: Freeman Dyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am saying that all predictions concerning climate are highly uncertain

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I think even the most beautiful person looks stupid on Skype

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: As the world's getting filled with temptations, we're getting a bit frivolous and a bit fickle

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never forget where I'm from. It's essential to remain humble and evolving

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything big-budget or stereotypical I was offered after 'Slumdog Millionaire' was a huge no-no

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to jump out of a plane. I have a fear of heights I'd like to face

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: There's one disturbing notion throughout India that light skin is more attractive than dark

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I am first and foremost an actress of Indian origin

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I love going into a country and just blending

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a human being before anything else

Quote.Author: Freida Pinto
Quote.QuoteValue: I absolutely love London; it is one of my favourite cities in the world

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: The rightful claim to dissent is an existential right of the individual

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: Resistance at all cost is the most senseless act there is

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: Human life is beyond comprehension

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone who is about to die does not mourn the dead

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between humans and wild animals is that humans pray before they commit murder

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst possible turn can not be programmed. It is caused by coincidence

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is always a delusion

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: A state always calls itself fatherland when it is ready for murder

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: The freedom of each individual can only be the freedom of all

Quote.Author: Friedrich Durrenmatt
Quote.QuoteValue: A story is not finished, until it took the worst turn

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep true to the dreams of your youth

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is the daughter of freedom

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Against stupidity the very gods themselves contend in vain

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: The strong man is strongest when alone

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is the most persuasive rhetoric

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Great souls suffer in silence

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: It does not prove a thing to be right because the majority say it is so

Quote.Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Appearance rules the world

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinemascope is not for men, but for snakes and funerals

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have always been my best friends

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, cinema is a vice. I love it intimately

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I was called the greatest director in Europe, but I was just a hard worker

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: My private life has nothing to do with my films

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I like folk songs, but ten horses couldn't bring me to a concert or an opera

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the same to me as it was to Goethe - a pleasant noise. I am an eye man, not an ear man

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not like producers

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not an artist. I am a craftsman

Quote.Author: Fritz Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: In America, sex is preached; in France, it is done

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: You got one life to live. So I'm living it the way I want to live it

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to create your own path, no matter what situation you're in

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't question magic

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: If you behind me, I'm not going to look back and try and figure out what you're doing behind me

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes an astronaut so long to get to space - that's how long it takes to catch up on my music

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: Rumours are rumours. The Internet is going to report whatever they have to speculate on

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't giving up on myself, so if you give up on me, I ain't got nothing else to say for you

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel a responsibility for telling the truth

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just not going to settle for anything, you know?

Quote.Author: Future
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody can relate to being real or true. Somehow, someway, you want to be real and true

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: The key factor in the vodka category is smoothness, and smoothness is what our vodka has

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to make things right with Tiger first before anything else

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I got close, somebody seemed to play a little better

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not a bowl full of cherries, there's good and bad stuff

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Vodka does not ease back pain. But it does get your mind off it

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Have a little fun. A few laughs

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: When things are going good they just keep going good

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to walk into a club and see your picture. Then you know you've done something good

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: Every shot makes someone happy

Quote.Author: Fuzzy Zoeller
Quote.QuoteValue: I realize I'm not a machine. I'm going to make mistakes

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: Keeping in touch with the people that matter is important

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're around somebody like E-40, all you can do is watch and learn, and soak up game

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate picking out clothes

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: You have this ability in hip hop to be invincibly cool, and that is a part of G-Eazy

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: Touring is starting to feel more like home than home does

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a job since I was old enough to work - since I was, like, 14

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom was a single parent

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm on Tumblr all the time

Quote.Author: G-Eazy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not on the radio all day long. I'm not on TV

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Superheroes don't often get their powers in one fell swoop. It's like superhero puberty

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: So many people are of mixed heritage; everyone is from somewhere else

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, insomnia was something ordinary, and it came and went for ordinary reasons

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Muslims are ordinary members of the working public, just like you

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't believe in spiritual homelands, and found God as readily in a strip mall as in a mosque

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in New Jersey and lived there until I was about 10, so Jersey is in my roots

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep setting the bar higher for myself in terms of what I'm trying to accomplish

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every Muslim woman has to feel the world out for herself

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's patently impossible for a Muslim character to represent 'all Muslims.'

Quote.Author: G. Willow Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've wanted to write comics ever since I figured out it was a job

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: You just have to be yourself and go full with confidence and be courageous

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Gold medals are made out of sweat, blood and tears and effort in the gym every day

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The hard work definitely paid off and hard work always does

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom says I'm a fighter, a fierce competitor, and I think I am, too

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Gospel music always relaxes me and calms my nerves

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I kind of do think of myself as a superhero and just flying high, and doing these crazy flips

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Always be courageous and strong, and don't fear

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to tell my story and where I came from and my background, because it was not easy

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: You need your mom and dad to protect you. It means they love you so much

Quote.Author: Gabby Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned from my mom to always keep pushing yourself

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my personal plights in this business is about playing 'The Sassy Black Girl.'

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a nice smile, pretty lips, and big round cheeks. They help me look like a teenager

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: Your body is your temple, it's your home, and you must decorate it

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a girl from Harlem who ended up in the right place at the right time

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people look at me and don't expect much. Even though, I expect a whole lot

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the way I look. I'm fine with it. And if my body changes, I'll be fine with that

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: While 'Precious' isn't a real person, it's someone's story, and it's too many peoples' story

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't fixate on other people's opinions of my body

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a big fan of doing what my mother wants me to do, like any daughter

Quote.Author: Gabourey Sidibe
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a birthmark on the inside of my left knee that resembles an upside-down sea horse

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: If God hadn't rested on Sunday, He would have had time to finish the world

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: What matters in life is not what happens to you but what you remember and how you remember it

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: He who awaits much can expect little

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: A man knows when he is growing old because he begins to look like his father

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: An early-rising man is a good spouse but a bad husband

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame is very agreeable, but the bad thing is that it goes on 24 hours a day

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: Necessity has the face of a dog

Quote.Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote.QuoteValue: No, not rich. I am a poor man with money, which is not the same thing

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: Boys are so much drama

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: If someone lacked decency or respect, I didn't allow that person to stay in my world

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood needs to recognise all shades of African American beauty

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: But I prefer to go to comedies. Give me Julia Roberts smiling anyday

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: If my real life was half as exciting as what is reported, I would be thrilled

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: My friends are very opinionated about the people I date

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality TV looks more like America than movies do

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as a healthy tan, and that's what people need to understand

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had an interest in sports across the board

Quote.Author: Gabrielle Union
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been trying to get cast as a lesbian for years

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: Alexander Gonzalez Inarritu is a great director. He's the one I first worked with. He's amazing

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: In Latin America, you don't do things for the money because there is no money

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: I go with the flow. Whatever music you play for me, I'll dance

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole Baja California peninsula is an energetic place, and it's incredibly alive

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very difficult to raise money, especially in the United States, for independent movies

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: Recently I've been doing risottos. Some of them have been amazing. Some of them, not all of them

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to do work, but I also want to have a good time

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy should be practiced not every six years, but every day

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent survives and remains while beauty is diluted

Quote.Author: Gael Garcia Bernal
Quote.QuoteValue: Histories are to educate so that we understand better for ourselves and for motivation

Quote.Author: Gail Sheehy
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity can be described as letting go of certainties
